pr_title: Fix for user able to access the account even after de-activated

timeline.message: code commit of issue fix for user able to access the account even after de-activated

timeline.bodyText: Don't declare variables before they are assigned.
timeline.author: nikklassen

timeline.bodyText:
One variable per declaration.
isDeactivateUser should be isInactiveUser
Please move variable declaration closer to where it is used (line 419)
timeline.author: nikklassen
nikklassen
nikklassen

timeline.bodyText: This should be returning a bool
timeline.author: nikklassen

timeline.message: code commit for issue fixes based on GitHub PR #364 comments

timeline.bodyText: This method needs to be called isInactiveUser.

replies.bodyText: Also should be boolean. Avoid boxing primitives when possible.

timeline.bodyText:
This is exactly the same as what I asked you to change in the other file
